description: Patti Smith, the “godmother of punk,” crossed a new frontier when she wrote an original song for the movie “Noah,” based on the biblical flood.
title: Patti Smith’s Cinematic Lullaby
title_page: Patti Smith’s Cinematic Lullaby - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Get behind the scenes of Hollywood’s awards season, with close-up looks at Oscar-nominated films and exclusive red-carpet access to the hottest actors, actresses and directors.
